message: Let's split it 50/50 and start fresh!
Take the low offer, or lose more
You're trying to lowball me, Bob! I'll give you a better deal this time.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're running out of time, Alice, don't be shy
I'm not going to give in easily, Bob! You're going to have to do better than that.
You're not getting any younger, Alice, time to make a decision
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm not going to give in now.
You're almost out of time, Alice, don't make me have to take it all
You're really lowballing me now, Bob! I'm not going to take it.
Last chance, Alice. Take it or leave it.
